meta.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) Extended Closure Information - Lakewood City School District

a.title: Lakewood City School District CMS Login

div.h1: Lakewood City School District Quick Links

span.p: We share this page in our efforts to keep our Lakewood Schools community informed with the latest information on the coronavirus outbreak and our resulting extended closure plan as it relates to our students and staff. You will find all District communications housed here as well as resources to help you understand more about coronavirus and COVID-19.
Mondays and Thursdays from 11 am - 12 pm at Garfield, Harding and Lakewood High School
Mondays and Thursdays from 11 am - 12 pm at Garfield, Harding and Lakewood High School
Other times, please call the Tech Dept. at 216-529-4088

p.a: April 9, 2020 Video Message from Dr. Barnes

span.p: The Ohio Department of Health has established a Call Center, staffed by licensed nurses and infectious disease experts to answer questions regarding coronavirus every day, 9 a.m.-8 p.m. Call 1-833-4-ASK-ODH (1-833-427-5634).
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact our District Nurse, Katy Corrigan, at kathleen.corrigan@lakewoodcityschools.org.

div.div:
This is a secure Staff Intranet content page and cannot be viewed by the public. Please contact your Technology Director to gain access to the Staff Intranet area in order to view this page.
Thank you,

a.title: Lakewood City School District CMS Login

div.p: In partnership with our families and community, Lakewood City Schools will develop responsible citizens, who are critical and creative thinkers, committed to life-long learning, invested in a diverse society, and prepared for technological and global opportunities.
